result.eng: Red and white colours alternated on it.
result.ga: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aon
result.orig: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aon
result.html: Bhí dathanna dearga agus bána orthu ar aonRed and white colours alternated on it.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí daṫanna dearga agus bána orṫu ar aonRed and white colours alternated on it.

result.eng: They had to rebuild the house.
result.ga: Bhí orthu an teach a atógáil
result.orig: Bhí orthu an teach a atógáil
result.html: Bhí orthu an teach a atógáilThey had to rebuild the house.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orṫu an teaċ a atógáilThey had to rebuild the house.

result.eng: How long will it take them?
result.ga: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.orig: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthu
result.html: Cá fhad a thógfaidh sé orthuHow long will it take them?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḟad a ṫógfaiḋ sé orṫuHow long will it take them?

result.eng: How many times did they fail?
result.ga: Cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.orig: Cá liacht uair a theip orthu
result.html: Cá liacht uair a theip orthuHow many times did they fail?
result.ponchtml: Cá liaċt uair a ṫeip orṫuHow many times did they fail?

result.eng: They were punished harshly.
result.ga: Gearradh pionós géar orthu
result.orig: Gearradh pionós géar orthu
result.html: Gearradh pionós géar orthuThey were punished harshly.
result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ pionós géar orṫuThey were punished harshly.

result.eng: They took to the mountains.
result.ga: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.orig: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.html: Thug siad an sliabh orthu féinThey took to the mountains.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug siad an sliaḃ orṫu féinThey took to the mountains.

result.eng: They have different names.
result.ga: Tá ainmneacha difriúla orthu
result.orig: Tá ainmneacha difriúla orthu
result.html: Tá ainmneacha difriúla orthuThey have different names.
result.ponchtml: Tá ainmneaċa difriúla orṫuThey have different names.

result.eng: They are happy and have no earthly cares.
result.ga: Tá siad sona agus níl cúraimí básmhara orthu
result.orig: Tá siad sona agus níl cúraimí básmhara orthu
result.html: Tá siad sona agus níl cúraimí básmhara orthuThey are happy and have no earthly cares.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad sona agus níl cúraimí básṁara orṫuThey are happy and have no earthly cares.

result.eng: Look what is written on them.
result.ga: Breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthu
result.orig: Breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthu
result.html: Breathnaigh céard atá scríofa orthuLook what is written on them.
result.ponchtml: Breaṫnaiġ céard atá scríofa orṫuLook what is written on them.

result.eng: Nobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ga: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.orig: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthu
result.html: Níor labhair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga bhí dreach sollúnta orthuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.
result.ponchtml: Níor laḃair aon duine fiú na páistí beaga ḃí dreaċ sollúnta orṫuNobody spoke, even the children had solemn expressions.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: Coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: Their mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ga: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.orig: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthu
result.html: Tháinig uisce lena bhfiacla ar mhéad is a bhí d'ocras orthuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig uisce lena ḃfiacla ar ṁéad is a ḃí d'ocras orṫuTheir mouth started watering with all that hunger.

result.eng: You will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ga: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.orig: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libh
result.html: Feicfidh sibh sceacha a bhfuil deilgne orthu Má éiríonn libh na sceacha deilgneacha a chur díbh beidh an lá libhYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ siḃ sceaċa a ḃfuil deilgne orṫu Má éiríonn liḃ na sceaċa deilgneaċa a ċur díḃ beiḋ an lá liḃYou will see bushes with thorns. If you manage to negotiate those throny bushes, you will have succeeded.

result.eng: She nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ga: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.orig: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird di
result.html: Sméid sí orthu ach rinne siad neamhaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.
result.ponchtml: Sméid sí orṫu aċ rinne siad neaṁaird diShe nodded at them but they ignored her.

result.eng: They would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ga: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.orig: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthu
result.html: Ba ghnách leo bualadh le chéile i mbialanna agus málaí a mhalartú a raibh an chuma chéanna orthuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.
result.ponchtml: Ba ġnáċ leo bualaḋ le ċéile i mbialanna agus málaí a ṁalartú a raiḃ an ċuma ċéanna orṫuThey would meet in restaurants and exchange bags that looked the same.

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.html: D'fhan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan muintir Mandelbrot ann le linn an ċogaiḋ agus cónaí orṫu i Tulle baile beag i lár na tíreThe Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: The children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ga: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.orig: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthu
result.html: Chuaigh na páistí a luí ach ní raibh fonn codlata orthuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ na páistí a luí aċ ní raiḃ fonn codlata orṫuThe children went to bed but were not sleepy.

result.eng: I guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ga: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.orig: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoile
result.html: Is cosúil go bhfuil sé de bhuaidh orthu a bheith tugtha don ghloine mar mháistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.
result.ponchtml: Is cosúil go ḃfuil sé de ḃuaiḋ orṫu a ḃeiṫ tugṫa don ġloine mar ṁáistrí scoileI guess it is their lot, as schoolmasters, to be fond of the bottle.

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: Make sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ga: Bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.orig: Bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.html: Bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadhMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ponchtml: Bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a ḃreiṫ orṫu agus a dtaċtaḋMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.

result.eng: That was the last I saw of them.
result.ga: Ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthu
result.orig: Ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthu
result.html: Ba é sin an t-amharc deireanach a fuair mé orthuThat was the last I saw of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba é sin an t-aṁarc deireanaċ a fuair mé orṫuThat was the last I saw of them.
